item.title: Hosting
item.description: Welcome! Here’s a first post about this webiste. Intro Tools: Hugo Azure Statis Web Apps Github VScode Markdown Hugo is an open-source static site generators based on Markdown. It allows you to generate static pages that requieres very few resources to serve. There will be some html, some css and some JS, and that’s pretty much it. This will garantee an easy to maintain and very responsive website.

item.title: About
item.description: Another tech blog. 上がる: to climb; to rise; to go up; to come up; to ascend; to advance Who am I? Hi, I’m Simon Michelizza, a 34 year old cloud architect. I’m mostly working with Azure, devops, Intune, AKS,… And this is about sharing the good, and mostly the ugly so you don’t have too.
